alert.note: Alert for Dalton Highway Summits (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:33PM AKST until January 04 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...High winds and blowing snow with low visibility expected. East winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From noon Tuesday to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will cause low visibility over summits. Large snow drifts will form. Strong winds could blow down trees and push over high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...East winds will increase Tuesday with the strongest winds Tuesday night into Wednesday night.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for blowing snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
